title: The US ended 2025 with steady but elevated inflation in December
full_text: The US ended 2025 with steady but elevated inflation in December. The consumer price index increased 2.7% in December as expected, matching the year-over-year increase in November.. The Bureau of Labor Statistics published the December consumer price index data.Myung J. Chun/Los Angeles Times via Getty Images <ul><li>The inflation rate remained at 2.7% in December, matching exp… [+1679 chars]
